amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on problem gambling among members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1902 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1902 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Warren to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4266) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on problem gambling among members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1902 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1902 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Warren to Amendment SA 1463.
